title: Google Discover tests expanded weather info at top of feed [Update: Sports too]
content:
Google has once again tweaked its signature Discover feed on Android to offer redesigned and expanded weather information at the top.

Update: Sports scores are also appearing in this same area.

moreâ€¦

The post Google Discover tests expanded weather info at top of feed [Update: Sports too] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has once again tweaked their signature Discover feed on Android to offer redesigned weather and sports information at the top.
